name: d3-voronoi-map-tween
description: D3 plugin allowing interpolation from one d3-voronoi-map to another
author: Kcnarf <fl.franck.lebeau@gmail.com>

scripts.precommit: yarn run test && uglifyjs build/d3-voronoi-map-tween.js -c -m -o build/d3-voronoi-map-tween.min.js
scripts.prepublish: zip -j build/d3-voronoi-map-tween.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-voronoi-map-tween.js build/d3-voronoi-map-tween.min.js
